text: Dobrica Ćosić (29 December 1921 - 18 May 2014) was a Serbian writer, theorist and politician. He was the first president of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia from 1992 to 1993. He is often known as the "Father of the Nation". ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Presidents of Yugoslavia Category:Presidents of Serbia and Montenegro
title: Dobrica Ćosić
